commands.title: Qorus: Set as active Qorus instance
Qorus: Set as inactive Qorus instance, stay logged in
Qorus: Set as inactive Qorus instance
Qorus: Login, set as active Qorus instance
Qorus: Login, stay inactive Qorus instance
Qorus: Open URL in an external tool
Qorus: Execute test files from directory

qorus.openUrlInExternalBrowser.mac.description: a default tool to use with custom URLs on Mac/OSX. By default 'open' is the standard tool on OSX

qorus.openUrlInExternalBrowser.windows.description: a default tool to use with custom URLs on MS Windows. By default we are using 'start <empty comment> <url>' for windows. As it seems better solution than 'explorer' for now. But you can try 'explorer' if you are facing issues with 'start'

qorus.openUrlInExternalBrowser.linux.description: a default tool to use with custom URLs on Linux. By default 'xdg-open' is the standard tool in Linux ecosystems

qorusDeployment.force.description: Force schema verification/downgrade with user schemas

qorusDeployment.verbosity-level.description: Sets verbosity level (greater value = more info)

qorusTest.continue-on-error.description: if one of the tests fails, server will continue on execution of the rest

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.ui-run-tests: rm -rf ui-test/test_project/* && cp -r ui-test/mock/* ui-test/test_project/ && npm run compile:test && ui-test/node_modules/.bin/extest run-tests ui-test/out/*.js && rm -rf ui-test/test_project/*
